Package com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.repositories

Interface AppointmentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Appointment,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Appointment,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Appointment,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Appointment>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Appointment,Integer>
public interface AppointmentRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Appointment,Integer>
Repository interface for managing appointments.

Provides methods to interact with the database for appointment-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • findAllAppointmentsPatientByDataInterval

      @Query(value="SELECT appointment.*, slot.time_start, slot.time_end, user.name, user.surname FROM appointment JOIN slot ON appointment.slot_id = slot.id JOIN user ON appointment.doctor_id = user.id WHERE ( appointment.patient_id = :patientId) AND appointment.date BETWEEN (:timeStart) AND (:timeEnd) ORDER BY appointment.date;", nativeQuery=true) List<Appointment> findAllAppointmentsPatientByDataInterval(@Param("patientId") int patientId, @Param("timeStart") LocalDate timeStart, @Param("timeEnd") LocalDate timeEnd)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific patient within a specified date interval.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      timeStart - the start date of the interval
      timeEnd - the end date of the interval
      Returns:
      a list of appointments for the specified patient within the date interval

    • findAllAppointmentsDoctorByDataInterval

      @Query(value="SELECT appointment.*, slot.time_start, slot.time_end, user.name, user.surname FROM appointment JOIN slot ON appointment.slot_id = slot.id JOIN user ON appointment.patient_id = user.id WHERE ( appointment.doctor_id = :doctorId) AND appointment.date BETWEEN (:timeStart) AND (:timeEnd) ORDER BY appointment.date;", nativeQuery=true) List<Appointment> findAllAppointmentsDoctorByDataInterval(@Param("doctorId") int doctorId, @Param("timeStart") LocalDate timeStart, @Param("timeEnd") LocalDate timeEnd)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific doctor within a specified date interval.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      timeStart - the start date of the interval
      timeEnd - the end date of the interval
      Returns:
      a list of appointments for the specified doctor within the date interval

    • findFutureAppointmentsPatient

      @Query(value="SELECT appointment.*, slot.time_start, slot.time_end, user.name, user.surname FROM appointment JOIN slot ON appointment.slot_id = slot.id JOIN user ON appointment.doctor_id = user.id WHERE ( appointment.patient_id =:patientId) AND (appointment.date > CURRENT_DATE()) OR (appointment.date = CURRENT_DATE() AND slot.time_end >= CURRENT_TIME()) order by appointment.date asc limit 2;", nativeQuery=true) List<Appointment> findFutureAppointmentsPatient(@Param("patientId") int patientId)
      Retrieves future appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      a list of future appointments for the specified patient

    • findFutureAppointmentsDoctor

      @Query(value="SELECT appointment.*, slot.time_start, slot.time_end, user.name, user.surname FROM appointment JOIN slot ON appointment.slot_id = slot.id JOIN user ON appointment.patient_id = user.id WHERE ( appointment.doctor_id =:doctorId) AND (appointment.date > CURRENT_DATE()) OR (appointment.date = CURRENT_DATE() AND slot.time_end >= CURRENT_TIME()) order by appointment.date asc limit 4;", nativeQuery=true) List<Appointment> findFutureAppointmentsDoctor(@Param("doctorId") int doctorId)
      Retrieves future appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      Returns:
      a list of future appointments for the specified doctor

    • findPastAppointments

      @Query(value="SELECT appointment.*, slot.time_start, slot.time_end, user.name, user.surname FROM appointment JOIN slot ON appointment.slot_id = slot.id JOIN user ON appointment.doctor_id = user.id WHERE ( appointment.patient_id =:patientId) AND (appointment.date < CURRENT_DATE() OR (appointment.date = CURRENT_DATE() AND slot.time_end < CURRENT_TIME())) order by appointment.date DESC limit 2;", nativeQuery=true) List<Appointment> findPastAppointments(@Param("patientId") int patientId)
      Retrieves past appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      a list of past appointments for the specified patient
